message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this product and believe it would be valuable to you. I'm offering it at $150. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I think $150 is a bit high. I'm willing to pay $120 for it. Can you consider my offer?
Thanks for your interest, Bob. I appreciate your offer, but I can't go lower than $135. This product is high-quality and I'm confident it will be worth the investment.
I understand the product is high-quality, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $125 for it. Can you consider my offer?
